org.contentmine.pdf2svg2

Class AbstractPageParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pdfbox.contentstream.PDFStreamEngine
      • org.apache.pdfbox.contentstream.PDFGraphicsStreamEngine
        • org.apache.pdfbox.rendering.PageDrawer
          • org.contentmine.pdf2svg2.AbstractPageParser
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PageParserOne, PageParserTwo, PageParserZero

    public abstract class AbstractPageParser
extends org.apache.pdfbox.rendering.PageDrawer
    supports subclasses of PageDrawer (example from PDFBox2) which renders PDFStream to AWT. AMIPDFParser intercepts these and builds SVG. Only the key methods for SVG are included here
    Author:
    pm286

      • beginText

        public void beginText()
               throws java.io.IOException
        start of text. I think this should always be balanced by endText() use beginText ... endText if you want to chunk the text in the way the authors have not mandatory
        Overrides:

      • strokePath

        public void strokePath()
                throws java.io.IOException
        this does the actual stroking gets stroke and Stroke from PDGraphics this is where we capture the stroke and stroke-width then create the SVGPath and dispatch it does not reset fill
        Overrides:

      • fillPath

        public void fillPath(int windingRule)
              throws java.io.IOException
        gets fill from PDGraphics. does not reset the stroke this is where we capture the fill and then create the SVGPath and dispatch it probably add it to a SVGG.
        Overrides:
        fillPath in class org.apache.pdfbox.rendering.PageDrawer
        Parameters:
        windingRule -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • fillAndStrokePath

        public void fillAndStrokePath(int windingRule)
                       throws java.io.IOException
        Fills and then strokes the path. this is when the stroke width interacts with the fill and changes the latter Shape (I think)
        Overrides:
        fillAndStrokePath in class org.apache.pdfbox.rendering.PageDrawer
        Parameters:
        windingRule - The winding rule this path will use.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there is an IO error while filling the path.
